name: respitely

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && NODE_ENV=production node server.js
scripts.dev: cd server && npm install && NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js

description: A full-stack & responsive web application, designed to help those experiencing homelessness & food insecurity in identifying nearby shelters and community meals, based on their individual needs and the latest updates from locations around the city.
